entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Témiscamingue

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
